bio: Hi, I’m Mohamed Maimoune 21yo, a passionate Full-Stack Web Developer from Casablanca, Morocco. I build modern and scalable web apps that turn ideas into digital experiences.
about_paragraph_1: As a Junior Full-Stack Web Developer and IT Technician from Casablanca, Morocco, I specialize in building modern, scalable applications with React and Laravel. I enjoy crafting complete digital solutions — from intuitive front-end interfaces to secure and efficient back-end APIs. My background in computer maintenance and system support strengthens my understanding of how software and hardware work together to deliver reliable results.
about_paragraph_2: Driven by curiosity and continuous growth, I'm always exploring new technologies and best practices to stay ahead in a fast-evolving tech landscape. My work reflects a strong balance between clean code, user experience, and performance, and I strive to build applications that are not only functional and elegant but also meaningful and impactful — whether working independently or within a team.
Each project is a unique piece of develo: Each project is a unique piece of development

youchef_description: A Collaborative Recipe Platform that lets users share and discover recipes in real time. Designed with a modern, responsive UI for an engaging and seamless culinary experience.
foody_description: A Stylish and Responsive Restaurant Website. Modern and visually engaging designed to offer an intuitive and seamless user experience.

Something new is coming — stay tuned.
mihna_description_1: Before Mihna, job seekers and employers often faced fragmented recruitment processes — candidates struggled to find relevant opportunities, while recruiters had difficulty managing and tracking applications effectively. Communication gaps and a lack of intelligent tools made hiring slow and inefficient.
mihna_description_2: Mihna is a full-stack web platform that bridges this gap by connecting candidates and employers through an intelligent, streamlined system. It offers automated application tracking, real-time notifications, and an integrated chatbot assistant — helping both sides save time, stay organized, and make smarter career decisions.
mihna_challenge: How can we create a seamless job-matching experience while keeping the platform simple and efficient for both candidates and companies? We aimed not just to replicate existing job portals, but to go beyond — offering smart recommendations, streamlined applications, and real-time interaction between talent and employers.
